DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Raloxifene exercise may improve bone health quality life breast cancer survivor . Assessing bone health quality life may improve ability plan treatment . PURPOSE : Randomized clinical trial study effectiveness raloxifene without exercise compare exercise alone woman previously treat breast cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Raloxifene With Without Exercise Compared With Exercise Alone Women Who Have Been Previously Treated Breast Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Determine effect raloxifene without exercise versus exercise alone bone reabsorption rate , bone formation rate , bone density woman previously treat breast cancer . - Determine effect regimens quality life patient . OUTLINE : This randomize , placebo-controlled , multicenter study . Patients randomize one four treatment arm . - Arm I : Patients ask exercise 5 day week instruction . Patients also receive oral placebo daily . - Arm II : Patients receive oral raloxifene daily . - Arm III : Patients ask exercise arm I . Patients also receive oral raloxifene daily . - Arm IV : Patients receive oral placebo daily . All patient receive oral calcium supplement daily . Treatment continue arm 24 month absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Quality life assess baseline every 3 month study . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 240 patient ( 60 per treatment arm ) accrue study .
